Yggdrasil: Yeah, but the fact is I don'y even know where Talos is, or 
even if he's alive right now. Got any clue?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> "I see," Gatara muses.  "We're in much the same boat - until we get 
> our engines repaired, this is just a fancy apartment complex."
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nic" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Yggdrasil figures that they can be friendlies and decides to talk.
> > 
> > Yggdrasil: I'm the commander of the Maximal Iron Squad, a special 
> unit 
> > formed especially for dirty interventions. I came here to bring 
> Talos 
> > back, but there's a reason they chose me: I'm his cousin and 
> Optimus 
> > Prime's descendant. But now, my ship seems to have been destroyed 
> in 
> > orbit 'cause I can't enter in contact with it anymore. Whatever 
> > happens, I'm now stuck here.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > > "Me?  Well, the Rogues got started when I, a Predacon at the 
> time, 
> > > met a Maximal named Devilcat." Gatara says, rather bluntly.  "He 
> was 
> > > a visionary; he looked past the political doublespeak the 
Maximal 
> > > Elders and Tripredacus Council spouted both at each other and 
the 
> > > citizenry, and he saw the uselessness of it all.  So we broke 
> off - 
> > > formed our own society, our own way of life.  Naturally, the 
> > > aforementioned councils branded us as criminals the instant they 
> > > learned what we'd done.  But it was too late, and we started 
> picking 
> > > up recruits from all over the place.  We got established as more 
> > than 
> > > just a fringe group when we latched onto an old pleasure cruiser 
> and 
> > > retrofitted it to this - the Rogue Star."  She indicates their 
> > > current surroundings.  "We travelled far and wide, limited only 
> by 
> > > our own imaginations when we chose our destinations.  We met 
> several 
> > > alien races, and managed to incorporate their technology into 
> what 
> > we 
> > > already had.  One of these called themselves the Shyft - that's 
> > where 
> > > we got our lovely little dissapearing act.  Now, how about you - 
> I 
> > > imagine there's more to your story then just coming here out of 
> thin 
> > > air looking for a friend."
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nic" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > > Yggdrasil follows and seats himself on the rather small chair. 
> He 
> > > was 
> > > > not the kind to like games though, so he did not touch the 
> > commands.
> > > > 
> > > > Yggdrasil: What about you? How did you join up with the 
others?
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > > > > Gatara laughs.  "Of course we're not!  Some of us used to be 
> > > > > Predacons, some were Maximals - but no longer.  We follow 
our 
> > own 
> > > > > rules, march to our own drum."
> > > > > 
> > > > > She leads her companion into Rogue Star's recreation area.  
> > > Gatara 
> > > > > plunks herself down at a table with a holo-projector built 
in 
> > for 
> > > > > games and the like.  "Have a seat.  It's been a while since 
> I've 
> > > had 
> > > > > a chance to talk with someone from my own weight class."
